speaker: Robert T. Parry's Speeches
title: Three Questions about the Economic Slowdown

speaker: Robert T. Parry's Speeches
title: A Monetary Policymaker's Perspective on the Economy

speaker: Robert T. Parry's Speeches
title: A Monetary Policymaker's Perspective on the Economy

speaker: Robert T. Parry's Speeches
title: Technology and the Productivity Boom: A Policymaker's Regional and National Perspectives
content:
I. I’m very pleased to be back here at Philadelphia University. I spent some very special years of my life here, and I have a deep fondness for the community.

II. Let me start with the national economy.

III. Now let me turn to technology and regional economies.

IV. The secret to the Silicon Valley’s strength as a technology center lies in a number of factors – aside from good weather.

V. Being a leader in the nation’s high-tech economy has brought substantial benefits to the region.

# # #
